name: BladeFall (Rolandem)
description:
Quite unfinished but very fun!

Awesome game where you have to fall as fast as you can while still dodging spinning blades, the time dilation mechanic makes the game a very intense balancing act where you want to fall as fast as possible for higher score but need to slow down for each blade or risk your life and go full speed. :)

Current Features

  • Fun gameplay where player needs to increase the game speed or decrease it rapidly to get more points while dodging the spinning blades
  • 2 fun abilities
  • 3D mode for different coloured glasses
  • In depth graphical settings
  • Two characters with unique animations
  • Sound effects
  • Progression with multiple levels/zones that increase in difficulty and point gain
  • Many upgrades to unlock
  • Endless mode
  • Different types of obstacles 

To add/fix

  • Fix the gates between the different areas
  • Remove "Options Menu" text from Help page
  • Fix cliping on walls, especially in 3D mode
  • Fully texture Block Character
  • Fully animate both characters
  • Add more characters
  • Add more textures/graphics
  • Add more abilities
  • Improve progression
  • Improve performance
  • More

I was planning on finishing this game but have not touched in a while, some donations would really help encourage me to finish it :D

thx hope you enjoy!
